summary: P88 Doping Feature Testing Complete - Backend 100% pass (20/20), Frontend UI verified

minor.issue: Intermittent Meilisearch timeout errors (ReadTimeout) observed in logs - search may fail occasionally

critical_code_review_comments: featured_until and urgent_until columns correctly created at startup via _ensure_listing_doping_columns()
GET /api/admin/listings correctly filters by applicant_type (individual/corporate) and doping_type (free/showcase/urgent)
POST /api/admin/listings/{listing_id}/doping correctly sets doping with 7/30/90/custom days
Doping priority correctly implemented: Vitrin > Acil > Ücretsiz (showcase clears urgent_until)
/api/v2/search returns is_featured and is_urgent fields correctly
SearchPage.js has doping badge+border rendering with correct data-testids
HomePage.js has doping badge+border rendering with correct data-testids and CSS classes
All 3 doping tabs visible on Individual and Corporate listing applications pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: P88 Doping feature fully implemented. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_doping_features.py cover: doping columns, applicant_type filter, doping_type filter, POST doping endpoint (7/30/90/custom days), search is_featured/is_urgent fields, doping priority. Frontend pages Individual/Corporate Listing Applications have 3 doping tabs (Tümü/Ücretsiz/Vitrin/Acil). SearchPage and HomePage have doping badge+border rendering.

backend_schema_runtime.notes: featured_until and urgent_until columns present in listings response

GET_admin_listings_doping_type.notes: doping_type=free|showcase|urgent filters work, doping_counts has free/showcase/urgent keys

POST_admin_doping_endpoint.notes: All doping operations work: showcase/urgent/free with 7/30/90/custom days

search_v2_doping_fields.notes: /api/v2/search items include is_featured and is_urgent fields

doping_priority_vitrin_acil_ucretsiz.notes: Setting showcase clears urgent_until (priority: Vitrin > Acil > Ücretsiz)

individual_listing_applications_tabs.notes: Page shows 4 tabs: Tümü, Ücretsiz İlan, Vitrin İlan, Acil İlan with counts

corporate_listing_applications_tabs.notes: Page shows 4 tabs: Tümü, Ücretsiz İlan, Vitrin İlan, Acil İlan with counts

search_cards_doping_badge_border.notes: SearchPage.js lines 388-419: border colors #4f46e5 (featured)/#e11d48 (urgent), Vitrin/Acil badges with data-testids

home_vitrin_cards_doping_badge_border.notes: HomePage.js lines 175-188: border colors, Vitrin/Acil badges with CSS classes and data-testids
